Update cache

Source: vignettes/update.Rmd
update.Rmd

pkgdown.offline needs to retrieve the cached frontend dependencies from each pkgdown version (>= 2.1.0) and store them in package. Every time a new pkgdown version released on CRAN, the new version support needs to be added. pkgdown.offline also optimizes its package size by deduplicating these cache files.

  1. Open the package in development mode. Retrieve the raw pkgdown external dependencies cache for all supported pkgdown versions. For example:
path_cache <- file.path(tempdir(), "pkgdown.offline")
pkgdown.offline:::update_cache("2.1.0", destdir = path_cache)
pkgdown.offline:::update_cache("2.1.1", destdir = path_cache)
pkgdown.offline:::update_cache("2.1.2", destdir = path_cache)
  1. Create a minified cache in pkgdown.offline:
pkgdown.offline:::minify_cache(path_cache)
  1. Now the package contains the minified cache with deduplicated files in inst/cache/. Commit and push.

The restore_cache() function will be used automatically by copy_to_cache() at runtime when pkgdown.offline is used to initialize or build site.

Developed by First Last.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.2.
